     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031815">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031815">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031815">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951112">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951112" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031817">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031817">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031817">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031817">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;
           </span>
           found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17031817" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031818">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031818">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031818">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find authoritative introductions to my paper topic, with recommended resources in Spanish or English for further research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031818">
          <div id="boxatt17031818" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20693821">
              <a id="link_20693821" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20693821,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20693822">
              <a id="link_20693822" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20693822,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12402162}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20693851">
              <a id="link_20693851" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+mexico+history+society+and+culture&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20693851,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20077376}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Mexico
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field. Great for topic narrowing and for identifying the most important articles and books on a subject.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031819">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031819">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031819">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books in Spanish or English?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031819">
          <div id="boxatt17031819" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20693873">
              <a id="link_20693873" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20693873,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031820">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031820">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031820">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed (scholarly) journal articles in Spanish or English?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031820">
          <div id="boxatt17031820" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25236876">
              <a id="link_25236876" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236876,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25236867">
              <a id="link_25236867" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236867,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078927">
              <a id="link_20078927" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078927,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical research about Latin America and Spain. English and Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20079158">
              <a id="link_20079158" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20079158,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization of Latin America ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Interdisciplinary scholarly journals. English and Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4631116" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031822">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031822">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031822">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031822">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17031822" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031823">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031823">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031823">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951119">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951119" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
